about.details:
Incorporated in 1983, Popular Vehicles and Services Limited is engaged in the business of automobile dealerships in India.

Popular Vehicles provides complete services throughout the life cycle of vehicle ownership, including sales of new and preowned vehicles, servicing, spare parts distribution, driving schools, and third-party financial and insurance product sales.

The company's business can be divided into three segments

  1. Passenger vehicles including luxury vehicles,
  2. Commercial vehicles and
  3. Electric two-wheeler and three-wheeler vehicles

The company currently operates through a vast network consisting of 59 showrooms, 126 sales outlets and booking offices, 31 pre-owned vehicle showrooms and outlets, 134 authorized service centres, 40 retail outlets, and 24 warehouses across 14 districts of Kerala, eight districts in Karnataka, 12 districts in Tamil Nadu, and seven districts in Maharashtra. In addition to its showrooms, the sales outlets and booking offices facilitate its sales, whereas the retail outlets are responsible for selling and distributing spare parts and accessories.

In FY 2023, the company serviced 791,360 vehicles - 5,212 luxury, 163,013 commercial, 1,918 electric two-wheeler, and 857 electric three-wheeler vehicles - through 130 authorized service centres across dealerships.

The company's PAT increased from ₹324.55 million in Fiscal 2021 to ₹640.74 million in Fiscal 2023.

The company's total income for Fiscals 2021, 2022, and 2023 was ₹29,192.52 million, ₹34,841.99 million, and ₹48,926.28 million, respectively.

As of July 31, 2023, the company had 10,275 employees.

faqs.question: What is the Popular Vehicles & Services IPO?
faqs.answer:
Popular Vehicles & Services IPO is a main-board IPO of 20395205 equity shares of the face value of ₹2 aggregating up to ₹601.55 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹295 per share. The minimum order quantity is 50.

The IPO opens on March 12, 2024, and closes on March 14, 2024.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE, NSE.

faqs.question: How to apply in Popular Vehicles & Services IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Popular Vehicles & Services IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Popular Vehicles & Services IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Popular Vehicles & Services IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Popular Vehicles & Services IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Popular Vehicles & Services IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Popular Vehicles & Services IPO opens on March 12, 2024 and closes on March 14, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Popular Vehicles & Services IPO?
faqs.answer: Popular Vehicles & Services IPO lot size is 50, and the minimum amount required is ₹14,750.

faqs.question: How to apply for Popular Vehicles & Services IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Popular Vehicles & Services IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Popular Vehicles & Services IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Popular Vehicles & Services IPO will be done on Friday, March 15, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, March 18, 2024. Check the Popular Vehicles & Services IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Popular Vehicles & Services IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Popular Vehicles & Services IPO listing date is on Tuesday, March 19, 2024.
